howToPlayResults:
Terms and Conditons:

  • 1. All Happistar Players are eligible to participate in the God of Fortune Daily Quest.
  • 2. This campaign will run from 04:30 a.m of March 10, 2023 to 04:29 a.m of March 17, 2023.
  • 3. To join, players must go to the God of Fortune Daily Quest Special Tab and click the 'Gold Coin of the day'.
  • 4. Each Gold Coin has corresponding challenges that must be completed within the day to receive a reward.
  • 5. All rewards will be automatically credited in your account within 24 hours once the challenge has been completed and must reach the required wagering requirement before a withdrawal can be made.

Bonus Terms and Conditions:

  • 6. Free Spins=Winnings from free spins x 20 wagering requirement
  • 7. Casino Bonus=Bonus x 5 or 10 wagering requirement
  • 8. HappiStar reserves the right to change or cancel the bonus without notice.
  • 9. HappiStar reserves the right to disqualify any player who is found participating in any fraudulent activities.
  • 10. General Terms & Conditions apply.
chooseOfferTxt2: to be used on any slot game on the happistar platform
introMessage1: They say fortune favors the bold! Are you up for the challenge? Join the God of Fortune Daily Quest to click, complete, and conquer! Log in every day to click the Gold Coin of the Day and challenge yourself to complete tasks for your daily dose of good fortune!
introMessage2: Log in and complete a daily challenge to get rewarded!
comingSoonMsg: On Sunday 22nd to celebrate Happistar will be sharing the lucky with everyone.
comingSoonMsg2: Come back and see what's happening in 2 days.
